examples: Dumasia villosa subsp. leiocarpa (Benth.) B.Pan bis & X.Y.Zhu in Ann. Bot. Fenn. 47(4): 247. 2010
notes: Bo Pan (Gesneriaceae) is a different person. Although their English names are identical, their Chinese names are completely different. Associated with Inst. Bot., Chinese Acad. Sci., Beijing, China.
